title: Top 10 trending phones of week 50
description: We are two weeks away from the end of 2024 and yet the two most popular phones in our database were announced in the first quarter of the year. The interest in Samsung Galaxy A55 and Galaxy S24 Ultra may not be quite as high as when they first hit the shelves, but it's still enough to top our trending chart. [#InlinePriceWidget, 12824, 1#] A change of guard is just around the corner though, as the Redmi Note 14 Pro+ climbed to third place, followed by the Redmi Note 14. The Redmi Note 13 Pro has slipped to fifth, while the vivo X200 Pro has gained two more spots to capture the...
excerpt: Oppo Find X8 Pro, Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max and Realme GT 7 Pro on the rise. We are two weeks away from the end of 2024 and yet the two most popular phones...
text: We are two weeks away from the end of 2024 and yet the two most popular phones in our database were announced in the first quarter of the year. The interest in Samsung Galaxy A55 and Galaxy S24 Ultra may not be quite as high as when they first hit the shelves, but it's still enough to top our trending chart. Samsung Galaxy A55 These are the best offers from our affiliate partners. We may get a commission from qualifying sales. 128GB 8GB RAM$ 309.50C$ 402.99256GB 8GB RAM$ 311.99C$ 482.43Show all prices A change of guard is just around the corner though, as the Redmi Note 14 Pro+ climbed to third place, followed by the Redmi Note 14. The Redmi Note 13 Pro has slipped to fifth, while the vivo X200 Pro has gained two more spots to capture the sixth spot. The Redmi invasion continues with the Note 14 Pro in seventh, just ahead of the iPhone 16 Pro Max, which lost quite a lot of ground over the past week. Redmi Note 13 is now ninth, while the Samsung Galaxy A16 wraps up this edition of the chart. A new leader by the end of the year? We wouldn't rule it out if current trends continue.
html:
We are two weeks away from the end of 2024 and yet the two most popular phones in our database were announced in the first quarter of the year. The interest in Samsung Galaxy A55 and Galaxy S24 Ultra may not be quite as high as when they first hit the shelves, but it's still enough to top our trending chart.

Samsung Galaxy A55

These are the best offers from our affiliate partners. We may get a commission from qualifying sales.
128GB 8GB RAM$ 309.50C$ 402.99
256GB 8GB RAM$ 311.99C$ 482.43
Show all prices

A change of guard is just around the corner though, as the Redmi Note 14 Pro+ climbed to third place, followed by the Redmi Note 14.

The Redmi Note 13 Pro has slipped to fifth, while the vivo X200 Pro has gained two more spots to capture the sixth spot.

The Redmi invasion continues with the Note 14 Pro in seventh, just ahead of the iPhone 16 Pro Max, which lost quite a lot of ground over the past week.

Redmi Note 13 is now ninth, while the Samsung Galaxy A16 wraps up this edition of the chart.

A new leader by the end of the year? We wouldn't rule it out if current trends continue.
